Content: *p71864a01828*do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area18   *(c) the vertical acceleration of the gymnast varies while she is in contact with thetrampoline.  explain how the forces on the gymnast affect the vertical acceleration while she is in contact with the trampoline. your answer should identify the forces acting on thegymnast and the directions of the forces. ignore air resistance.(6)(total for question 15 = 14 marks)
